title: CYBER POP MORGANA
body: ive always thought of morgana's abilities to be hacker-esque in nature, primarily her q and e, a long range skillshot that prevents champions for moving for a long time and a shield that prevents all cc effects while it persists.

replies.body: OMG THAT WOULD BE SO BRILLIANT!!!! Especially with how her ult would look! Sort of a hack network that would break (stun) its targets <3
